Trigger.name: AbsolveBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c absolve " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: CurePoisonBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c 'pure touch' " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: ClarifyBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("quicken 9") send("c clarify " .. matches[2]) send("quicken off") send("sl")

Trigger.name: PanaceaBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c panacea " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: CureDiseaseBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c 'pure touch' " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: PortalBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Mid" then send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Attempting to open a portal to "..matches[3]) send("wa") send("c portal " .. matches[3]) send("w;sl") elseif botLocation == "Thorn" then send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Attempting to open a portal to "..matches[3]) send("wa") send("c portal " .. matches[3]) send("sleep") end

Trigger.name: NexusBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Mid" then send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Attempting to open a nexus to "..matches[3]) send("wa") send("c nexus " .. matches[3]) send("w;sl") elseif botLocation == "Thorn" then send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " No nexi on Thorngate.") end

Trigger.name: DivinityBot
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == nil or matches[3] == "1" then send("wa") send("c divinity " .. matches[2]) send("sl") else send("wa") send("augment " .. matches[3]) send("c divinity " .. matches[2]) send("augment off") send("sl") end

Trigger.name: InvigorateRejuvenateBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("augment 5") send("c rejuvenate " .. matches[2]) send("augment off") send("sl")

Trigger.name: MagicLightBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c 'magic light' " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: GiantStrengthBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c 'giant strength' " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: FlyBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c fly " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: InterventionBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c intervention " .. matches[2]) send("sl") send("config -savespell")

Trigger.name: RegenBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c regeneration "..matches[2]) send("follow self") send("sl")

Trigger.name: RemoveCurseBot
Trigger.script: send("tell "..matches[2].." Tell me 'absolve' if you are cursed. Find a Druid for cursed items.")

Trigger.name: WakenTrig
Trigger.script: send("sleep")

Trigger.name: SolitudeBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Thorn" then send("wa") send("c solitude " .. matches[2]) send("sl") else send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Sorry, I can't cast that on Midgaardia.") end

Trigger.name: RequiemBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Thorn" then if matches[3] == nil then send("wa") send("c requiem " .. matches[2]) send("sl") else send("wa") send("c requiem " .. matches[3]) send("sl") end else send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Sorry, I can't cast that on Midgaardia.") end

Trigger.name: ComfortBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Thorn" then if matches[3] == nil then send("wa") send("c comfort " .. matches[2]) send("sl") else send("wa") send("augment " .. matches[3]) send("c comfort " .. matches[2]) send("augment off") send("sl") end else send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Sorry, I can't cast that on Midgaardia.") end

Trigger.name: ThrenodySpellBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Thorn" then send("wa") send("c threnody " .. matches[3]) send("sl") else send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Sorry, I can't cast that on Midgaardia.") end

Trigger.name: SalvationSpellBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Thorn" then send("wa") send("c salvation " .. matches[3]) send("sl") else send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Sorry, I can't cast that on Midgaardia.") end

Trigger.name: Solitude Exhausted
Trigger.script: send ("reply Solitude spell exhausted currently")

regexCodeList.string: Your solitude spell is still exhausted.

Trigger.name: FortitudesBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c fortitudes " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: WaterBreathingBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c 'water breathing' " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: IronSkinBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c 'iron skin' " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: HolySightBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c 'holy sight' " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: FociBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c foci " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: AegisBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c aegis " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: InvincBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("inv " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: BeckonBot
Trigger.script: send("rest") send("follow "..matches[2]) send("gt gtell help for commands.") send("sl")

Trigger.name: PreachHelpBot
Trigger.script: send("gt gtell 'Preachup' for spells.") send("gt gtell 'Preach Sanc' for Sanctuary.") send("gt gtell 'Preach Div' or 'Preach Div2' through 'Preach Div5' for divinity.") send("gt gtell 'Preach Abs' for absolve.") send("gt gtell 'Regen' for regeneration on the leader only.") send("gt I will stop follow self after every command.")

Trigger.name: PreachUpBot
Trigger.script: if charMp >= 3500 then send("wa") --send("preach cure light") --send("preach refresh") send("gt Spells incoming") send("preach iron skin") send("preach holy sight") send("preach water breathing") send("preach fortitudes") send("preach foci") send("preach aegis") send("preach sanctuary") send("gt enjoy your spells") send("follow self") send("sl") else send("gtell Sorry, but I need more mana before I can preach spells.") end

Trigger.name: PreachClarifyBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("preach clarify") send("follow self") send("sl")

Trigger.name: PreachSancBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("preach sanc") send("follow self") send("sl")

Trigger.name: PreachAbsolveBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("preach absolve") send("follow self") send("sl")

Trigger.name: PreachDivBot
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == nil or matches[3] == "1" then if tonumber(charMp) >= 250 then send("wa") send("preach divinity") send("follow self") send("sl") else send("gt I need more mana to preach divinity.") end else local preachCost
if matches[3] == "2" then preachCost = 700 elseif matches[3] == "3" then preachCost = 1400 elseif matches[3] == "4" then preachCost = 2300 elseif matches[3] == "5" then preachCost = 3400 end
if tonumber(charMp) >= preachCost then send("wa") send("augment " .. matches[3]) send("preach divinity") send("augment 1") send("follow self") send("sl") else send("gt Sorry, I need more mana to preach an augmented divinity.") end end

Trigger.name: Spellup
Trigger.script: if charMp >= 1350 then send("wa") send("c 'iron skin' "..matches[2]) send("c 'holy sight' "..matches[2]) send("c 'water breathing' "..matches[2]) send("c fortitudes "..matches[2]) send("c foci "..matches[2]) send("c aegis "..matches[2]) send("c sanctuary "..matches[2]) send("sl") elseif charMp < 1350 then send("tell "..matches[2].." I need more mana before I can do a spellup. ("..charMp.."/"..charMaxMp.."m)") end

Trigger.name: SpellupAwake
Trigger.script: send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " I need to be sleeping first.") send("sleep")

Trigger.name: SanctuaryBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("c sanctuary " .. matches[2]) send("sl")

Trigger.name: FrenzyBot
Trigger.script: send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Sorry, priests don't get frenzy.")

Trigger.name: BlessBot
Trigger.script: send("wa") send("quicken 4") send("c bless " .. matches[2]) send("c bless " .. matches[2]) send("c bless " .. matches[2]) send("quicken off") send("sl")

Trigger.name: HomeshiftBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Mid" then send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Coming to thorn.") botLocation = "Thorn" send("wa;c homeshift;c teleport Pascilon;sleep") send("title the spell bot (|br|Thorngate|n|)") else send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Already on thorn.") end

Trigger.name: PlaneMidBot
Trigger.script: if botLocation == "Thorn" then send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Coming to mid.") botLocation = "Mid" send("wa;c planeshift mid;sanctum;d;w;sleep") send("title the spell bot (|br|Mid|n|)") else send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Already on mid.") end

Trigger.name: self holy sight
Trigger.script: if (gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Cleric") or (gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Paladin") or (gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Priest") or (gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Druid") or (gmcp.Char.Status.class == "Vizier") then if (gmcp.Room.Info.name == "An arch of water") or (gmcp.Room.Info.name == "AVATAR's Sanctum Infirmary") then send("wake") send("c 'holy sight'") send("sle") else send("c 'holy sight'") end end

Trigger.name: invis
Trigger.script: if(matches[2] == "someone") then send("reply priests dont get the *invis* spell") else send("reply priests dont get the *invis* spell") end

Alias.name: spellbot off
Alias.script: disableTrigger("BotTriggers") enableTrigger("Run Triggers") enableTrigger("Grouping Trigger") send("retitle") send("config -notake") cecho("Priest Bot - Off") send("config -noautomove")

Alias.name: spellbot on
Alias.script:
enableTrigger("BotTriggers") disableTrigger("Run Triggers") disableTrigger("Grouping Trigger") send("config +noautomove") cecho("Priest Bot - On") send("config -savespell")
if botLocation == "Mid" then send("title the priest bot (|br|Mid|n|)") else send("title the spell bot (|br|Thorngate|n|)") end

Script.name: GMCPCharStatus
Script.script:
function GMCPCharStatus() charStatus = gmcp.Char.Status
charName = charStatus.character_name charClass = charStatus.class charRace = charStatus.race charLevel = tonumber(charStatus.level) charSubLevel = tonumber(charStatus.sublevel) charTnl = tonumber(charStatus.experience_tnl) charMaxTnl = tonumber(charStatus.experience_tnl_max) charWis = tonumber(charStatus.wis) charWisPerm = tonumber(charStatus.wis_perm) charInt = tonumber(charStatus.int) charIntPerm = tonumber(charStatus.int_perm)
--Set Tier if charLevel < 51 then charTier = "Lowmort" elseif charLevel == 51 then charTier = "Hero" elseif charLevel == 125 then charTier = "Lord" end end

Script.name: GMCPCharVitals
Script.script:
function GMCPCharVitals() charVitals = gmcp.Char.Vitals
charHp = tonumber(charVitals.hp) charMaxHp = tonumber(charVitals.maxhp) charPctHp = charHp / charMaxHp * 100 charDiffHp = charMaxHp - charHp charMp = tonumber(charVitals.mp) charMaxMp = tonumber(charVitals.maxmp) charDiffMp = tonumber(charMaxMp - charMp) charMv = tonumber(charVitals.mv) charMaxMv = tonumber(charVitals.maxmv) charWeight = tonumber(charVitals.wgt) charMaxWeight = tonumber(charVitals.maxwgt) charDiffWeight = charMaxWeight - charWeight charNumItems = tonumber(charVitals.items) charLag = tonumber(charVitals.lag) charMonitorHp = tonumber(charVitals.monhp) charMonitorHpMax = tonumber(charVitals.maxmonhp) charQuicken = charVitals.quicken charSurge = tonumber(charVitals.surge) charAugment = tonumber(charVitals.augment) end

Script.name: GMCPRoomInfo
Script.script:
function GMCPRoomInfo() charArea = gmcp.Room.Info.zone charRoom = gmcp.Room.Info.name charEnvironment = gmcp.Room.Info.environment
if charArea == "{ ALL } AVATAR Sanctum" then botLocation = "Mid" elseif charArea == "{ LORD } Dev Rietta's Wonders" then botLocation = "Thorn" end end
